Item.name: Hard Helmet
Item.description: A relatively modern, brightly colored lightweight aluminium helmet designed with a head harness system, designed to greatly reduce impact of blunt force trauma to the skull. However, it does very little against threats such as predator's maws, and absolutely nothing against a bullet.

Item.name: Demolitionist Helmet
Item.description: A super heavy, reinforced ballistic helmet with lots of padding and special flak lining with a thick ballistic visor, designed to stop shrapnel and fragmentation from scrambling one's brains.

Item.name: Veteran's Helmet
Item.description: A very, very old spiked metal helmet from Earth, embellsihed with well-worn ornamentations and wrought in an archaic style from heavy, hard iron. Feels like something like this belongs in a museum moreso than on your head.

Item.name: Skid Lid
Item.description: A cheap, old-school steel helmet, designed to protect largely against shrapnel and blunt force trauma moreso than direct bullets and alien predator's jaws.

Item.name: R.H.I.N.O. Assault Helmet
Item.description: A heavy-duty, full-head helmet with an integrated automatic rebreather system as well as a litany of protective elements, designed for Coalition deathsquads to provide the upmost protection in the most dire of circumstances.

Item.name: Assault Shield
Item.description: A relatively compact reinforced tactical shield, much more easily held and manuever in one hand compared to full riot shield designs. However, it lacks the coverage of it's larger brethren.

Item.name: R.H.I.N.O. Assault Suit
Item.description: A heavy-duty, fully armored combat suit designed and made for Coalition land trooper deathsquads, not for deep-sea diving. Still, it provides some mild pressure resistance suitable for shallow water diving, though it lacks most integral life support systems. Includes a wide number of tactical drop pouches and bits of room for equipment, and makes you practically bulletproof.

Item.name: Lynx Exoskeleton Suit
Item.description: A relatively slim, lightweight minimally-powered exoskeleton, greatly increasing it's wearer's speed, strength and stability. While it fails to offer the protection of full-body diving suits or body armor, it makes the wearer much more agile, though it does absolutely nothing for the water.

Item.name: Alicebag
Item.description: A lightweight tactical bag, designed to hold lots of small things, with a special loop for holding a single weapon of almost any size. A little encumbering, especially for swimming.

Item.name: Riot Gear
Item.description: A set of lightweight ballistic armor reinforced with shock-absorbant materials and padding, designed to protect most of the body against blunt force impact and trauma. It also includes a number of handy utility pouches, for keeping vital equipment close at hand.

Item.name: Demolitionist Suit
Item.description: A heavy-duty, flame-retardant and impact-resistant suit reinforced with steel and refractive ballistic plating, designed to stop shrapnel and blunt force impact from shredding someone apart from all but the heaviest of explosions. A bit bulky to move around in, but highly protective against explosive threats- less so against others. Includes handy pouches in the legs for storing equipment close at hand.

Item.name: Hauler Exosuit
Item.description: An ultraheavy hydraulic nuclear-powered heavy lift exosuit, designed for industrial applications in all sorts of hazardous conditions. It lacks the extreme depth resistance of traditional diving Exosuits, but provides the wearer with incredible strength, and grants the ability to carry large quantities of extremely bulky items. It also has great environmental hazard protection characteristics.

Item.name: Buster Exosuit
Item.description: An ultraheavy hydraulic nuclear-powered heavy combat exosuit, designed for military combat operations against light vehicles and infantry alike, ideally on land. It lacks the extreme depth resistance of traditional diving Exosuits, but provides the wearer with incredible strength, and unparalleled protection. It also has great environmental hazard protection characteristics.

Item.name: Mudraptor Fullplate
Item.description: An exorbinantly heavy set of near full-body Mudraptor shell pieces, jointed in a manner akin to plate armor of old. Extremely protective, but cumbersome.

Item.name: Mudraptor Helmet
Item.description: A fearsome helmet crafted from the shell of a Mudraptor, built to resemble the beast's wicked mandibles.

Item.name: Veteran Mudraptor Fullplate
Item.description: An exorbinantly heavy set of near full-body Mudraptor shell pieces, jointed in a manner akin to plate armor of old. Extremely protective, but cumbersome. Darkened with hydroxyapatite, to resemble a more fearsome predator.

Item.name: Veteran Mudraptor Helmet
Item.description: A fearsome helmet crafted from the shell of a Mudraptor, built to resemble the beast's wicked mandibles. Darkened with ground hydroxyapatite, to resemble a more fearsome predator.

Item.name: Chitin Armor
Item.description: A sturdy set of upper-body armor made from deceptively lightweight chitin.

Item.name: Watcher Armor
Item.description: A thick, spiney suit of armor crafted from thick Watcher shell chunks. Very protective and extremely fire resistant, but cumbersome.

Item.name: Watcher Helmet
Item.description: A thick, spiney helmet crafted from spikey chunks of Watcher shell. Very protective, and extremely fire resistant.

Item.name: Moloch Armor
Item.description: A thick set of armor crafted from smooth moloch shell chunks, deceptively lightweight and manueverable, yet highly protective.

Item.name: Moloch Helmet
Item.description: A protective, masked helmet made from smooth chunks of strong Moloch shell. A trophy of a great hunter.

Item.name: Black Moloch Armor
Item.description: A thick set of armor crafted from smooth moloch shell chunks, deceptively lightweight and manueverable, yet highly protective. Darkened with ground hydroxyapitite, to resemble a more fearsome predator.

Item.name: Black Moloch Helmet
Item.description: A protective, masked helmet made from smooth chunks of strong Moloch shell. A trophy of a great hunter. Darkened with ground hydroxyapatite, to resemble a more fearsome predator.

Item.name: Endworm Fullplate
Item.description: An extremely durable suit of onyx-black heavy armor crafted from the shell of a mighty Endworm. Provides almost unparalleled protection, but it is very, very heavy.

Item.name: Endworm Helmet
Item.description: A fearsome, incredibly tough helmet carved from the iron-like shell of a mighty Endworm. A true trophy and a sight to behold.
